name: Walker Sands
tagline: Digital B2B strategies for real business results
description:
Walker Sands is a full-service B2B marketing agency with core capabilities in public relations, demand generation, branding, creative, marketing strategy & web. The firm’s integrated approach to marketing drives awareness, credibility and conversions for 100+ clients around the world. When you work with Walker Sands, you gain a team of experts who will create and execute a customized marketing strategies specifically designed to achieve your unique business goals.
So, what are your business goals? Are you looking to generate more inbound sales leads? Do you want to elevate the status of your brand? Would you like to generate more awareness of your brand and the value you deliver? Are you having trouble reconnecting with visitors to your website after they leave? Is your website buried beneath your competitors in search results? Tell us what results you’re looking for, and we’ll work with you to create a digital strategy to achieve them. The strategy we create for your business will be tailored to your goals, your resources and your industry. Along the way, we maintain fluid communication with your team and regularly present progress reports. We consistently test new ideas to optimize every tactic to better serve your digital strategy. While few strategies include every tactic at our disposal, Walker Sands team members are experts in digital marketing strategies including:
Brand Messaging
Content Marketing
Content Strategy
Design
Demand Generation
Display (CPM) Advertising
Email Marketing
Inbound Marketing
Marketing Automation
Pay-per-click (PPC) Advertising
Remarketing
Search Engine Optimization
SEO Content Creation
Social Advertising
Social Media
Website Content
Website Design
Website Development
Video
READ MORE...
